mapper.select: SELECT info.order_no, info.order_dt, line.order_prod_no, p.prod_name, p.prod_price, line.order_quantity FROM order_info info JOIN order_line line ON info.order_no=line.order_no JOIN product p ON line.order_prod_no = p.prod_no WHERE info.order_id=#{order_id} ORDER BY info.order_no DESC, p.prod_name
